content: these adorable acorn streetlamps are sure to add whimsy and joy to your christmas tree they also look darling on a wreath or make a wonderful addition to a seasonal display they are knit entirely in the round from the bottom up on dpns the candle is made with simple embroidery and the ends stuffed inside a handle is made using the cast off end and the pole is made with either a toothpick or a branch that slides into place i have always loved streetlamps how wonderful it must have been to see a lamplighter light them at sunset need a lantern that stands independently see my acorn lantern pattern 1 hope you enjoy this free pattern happy knitting natashat 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/acorn-lantern
